author: GeeLaw
body: # Steps to reproduce ```powershell Get-Alias | Out-GridView -PassThru ``` Then select some items in the window. # Expected behavior The UI has sufficient contrast. # Actual behavior The contrast is insufficient. For example, odd-numbered rows (blue), hovered items (lighter blue), and selected items (darker blue) are blues that are very close. In the screenshot above, item 2-4 are selected and item 8 is hovered. # Environment data ```none Name Value ---- ----- PSVersion 7.0.0 PSEdition Core GitCommitId 7.0.0 OS Darwin 19.2.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.2.0: Sat … Platform Unix PSCompatibleVersions {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…} PSRemotingProtocolVersion 2.3 SerializationVersion 1.1.0.1 WSManStackVersion 3.0 ```
